name: isomorphic-ensure
description: Use webpack loaders seamlessly – in node as well as in the browser.

scripts.check-size: npm run build; for file in index.js; do echo "$file"; uglifyjs "$file" | gzip | pv >/dev/null; done
scripts.clean:
git reset && echo '/node_modules/' > .gitignore && git add .gitignore && git stash save --include-untracked --keep-index '`npm run clean` trash can' && git clean --force -d && git reset --hard && echo '
clean: Uncommitted and ignored files have been moved to git’s stash. To restore them run `git stash pop --quiet; git checkout .gitignore`.'
scripts.coverage: npm run test:transpile && cd .es5 && istanbul cover test.js && cd ..
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: jshint . && npm run test:transpile && node .es5/test.js | tap-spec

author: Tomek Wiszniewski <t.wiszniewski@gmail.com>
